title: Happy Birthday Mississippi Monica, GA Mask, Jeff Bezos, Glamour Magazine and more.
itunes:title: Happy Birthday Mississippi Monica, GA Mask, Jeff Bezos, Glamour Magazine and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! The gift of gab is evident. The Chief Love Officer gets a female liar writing in and he calls her out. Steve shares with us a gem of wisdom from Deion Sanders. Fool #2 finally has a song for The J Spot Comedy Club at 5581 W Manchester Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90045. Clearly Marjorie Taylor Greene gives zero F's about masks and the fines attached to not wearing one. Only one thing to say. Thank you Tommy for bringing out the best from the fellas. Jeff Bezos got boo koo money because Hawaiian real estate ain't cheap. Happy Early Birthday to our Executive Producer Mississippi Monica! Today in Closing Remarks, Steve has a Dave Chappelle moment.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

Clearly Marjorie Taylor Greene gives zero F's about masks and the fines attached to not wearing one. Only one thing to say. Thank you Tommy for bringing out the best from the fellas.
